name: Die Twice
description:
If you encounter bugs, please restart the game and try again, we did not manage to fix many random bugs in 48 hours. Do not delete the game after the first bug please! Unfortunately in the build, there is a big chance that enemies won't move.

We made a backup build, it is likely that in it, the enemies will behave correctly.

This is very strange, since everything is fine in the engine with enemies, but something went wrong in the builds =(
